ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-14T02:25:39 [Issue ID 4000-467239] urn:comicvine:4000-467239
ComicInfo.Summary:
Announced and printed by Awesome, which folded before the release. Then Demonslayer & Avengelyne (spelled wrong on cover!) were both absorbed by Avatar, which released this preview and the one-shot cross-over.
Limited to 300 signed/numbered issues, this book is slightly larger than the regular comic-book sized issue and is a flip-book with TinCanMan (back cover has the Wizard World 2000 logo but no indicia).
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/avengelyne-demonslayer-0-preview/4000-467239/
ComicInfo.Title: Preview
